TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider
Public Class MenuDesigner Inherits HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider
type MenuDesigner = class inherit HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner interface IDataBindingSchemaProvider

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供分层菜单 Web 服务器控件。The class provides a hierarchical menu Web server control. 在可视化设计器中, 当您从源切换到设计视图时, 将分析描述关联控件的标记源代码, 并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时, 设计时控件将保存到标记并添加到网页的现有标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup and added to the existing markup for the Web page. 类为可视化设计器中的控件提供设计时支持。The class provides design-time support for controls in a visual designer. 属性返回一个对象, 该对象通常包含一个对象, 该对象是从设计器的继承树中的每个级别派生的。 The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 属性返回格式设置方案的集合, 以便在 "自动套用格式" 对话框中显示。 The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. 属性为关联的控件的模板返回模板组的集合。 The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 属性始终返回`true`, 指示设计器创建关联的的临时副本以生成设计时标记。 The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供了以下功能:The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法准备设计器, 以查看、编辑和设计关联的控件。 The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法返回用于在设计时呈现关联的标记。 The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 此方法获取在设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记 (如果没有任何标记可用)。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available. 方法提供在发生错误时在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。 The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source. 方法构造一个可在设计时用于关联控件的示例数据源。The method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类, 以便在设计时更改从控件派生的控件的外观。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例`MyMenu` 从派生类。The example derives the `MyMenu` class from the . 类是的副本。 `MyMenu`The `MyMenu` class is a copy of the . 该示例还从类`MyMenuDesigner`派生类 , 然后在`MyMenu`类上应用的`MyMenuDesigner`特性。The example also derives the `MyMenuDesigner` class from the class, and then applies a attribute for the `MyMenuDesigner` on the `MyMenu` class. `The MyMenuDesigner`重写以下成员:`The MyMenuDesigner` overrides the following members: - 用于在控件周围绘制橙色的虚线边框以使其范围更可见的方法。The method to draw an orange, dotted border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 为包含错误消息的占位符生成标记的方法,该错误消息以红色粗体文本显示。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 用于生成占位符标记的, 其中包含一条消息, 指示未定义任何菜单项。The to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains a message indicating that no menu items are defined. - 如果 关联的控件不是对象,则为引发异常的方法。`MyMenu`The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyMenu` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在设计图面上创建关联 控件或该控件的副本时, .NET Framework 在内部构造该类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要绑定到设计时数据源的 控件。

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下条件之一, 则方法会清除属性 , 然后调用基方法:If one of the following conditions is true, the method clears the property, and then calls the base method: - 属性不`null`为或空字符串 ("")。The property is not `null` or an empty string (""). - 属性不为 `null`。The property is not `null`. - 集合包含一个或多个元素。The collection contains one or more elements. 参数是与此设计器或该控件的副本关联的控件。 `dataBoundControl`The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法将设计时数据源绑定到关联的控件, 然后调用方法以使控件生成其 静态视图和动态视图标记。The method calls the method to bind the design-time data source to the associated control, and then the calls the method to cause the control to generate its static-view and dynamic-view markup. 返回当前视图的标记。The returns the markup for the current view. 如果未定义当前视图, 将 调用基方法。If the current view is not defined, the calls the base method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类继承的类中的方法。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法在设计时更改从控件派生的控件的外观。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the control at design time. 如果控件的属性为或值, 则该示例在控件周围绘制橙色的点虚线边框, 使其范围更可见。The example draws an orange, dotted border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the property of the control is the or value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 如果没有以其他方式提供标记，则获取在设计时呈现关联控件的占位符的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含在设计图面上呈现到占位符的标记文本。

span.span: A string containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为一个占位符生成标记, 该占位符指定控件名称和一条消息, 指示你使用集合编辑器来添加项。 The method generates the markup for a placeholder that specifies the control name and a message instructing you to use the collection editor to add items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类继承的类中的方法。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法在设计时更改从类派生的控件的外观。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例将生成一个占位符的标记, 其中包含一条消息, 指示未为关联的控件定义菜单项。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes a message indicating that no menu items are defined for the associated control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The object that was thrown.

summary.span: 如果发生了错误，提供在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含发生错误后在设计时呈现关联 的标记。

span.span: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法生成标记, 该标记将错误设计时控件呈现为一个占位符, 其中包含类型名称、控件名称和描述错误的消息。 The method generates markup that renders the error design-time control as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and messages describing the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类继承的类中的方法。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法在设计时更改从类派生的控件的外观。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 该示例生成包含错误消息的占位符的标记, 该错误消息以红色粗体文本显示。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetSampleDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetSampleDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 构造设计时使用的关联控件的示例数据源。

span.span: Constructs a sample data source to use at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 实现 的对象，以作为关联 的数据源。

span.span: An object implementing the to use as a data source for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法构造的示例数据源包含多个具有空路径的根菜单项。The sample data source that is constructed by the method has several root menu items with empty paths. 如果没有为关联控件定义菜单项, 并且菜单无法绑定到数据源, 则将在设计时使用此示例数据源。This sample data source is used at design time if no menu items are defined for the associated control and if the menu cannot be bound to a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements the interface.

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当可视化设计器准备好使用设计器呈现控件时, 将调用方法。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 方法及其基方法会配置属性并设置设计器操作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. 参数是与此设计器或该控件的副本关联的控件。 `component`The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类继承的类中的方法。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 重写的方法在设计时更改从类派生的控件的行为。The overridden method changes the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 如果关联的控件 `MyMenu`不是对象, 则此示例将引发异常。The example throws an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyMenu` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#6)]

exception.span: 组件不是 ，也不属于 的派生类。

span.span: *component* is not a or of a class derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control.

value.span: ，其中为 中的每个模板包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性从基属性获取一个对象。The property gets a object from the base property. 然后, 它将添加到名为 "`ItemTemplates`" 的对象, 该对象包含两个名为 "StaticItemTemplate" 和 "DynamicItemTemplate" 的对象。It then adds to the a object named "`ItemTemplates`" that contains two objects named "StaticItemTemplate" and "DynamicItemTemplate". 属性将此返回给调用方。 The property returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器应使用关联控件的副本还是应使用控件本身来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a copy of the associated control or use the control itself to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于属性始终`true` 为 , 因此设计器使用包含关联控件的副本的控件来生成设计时标记。 Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控件不会影响对象的任何持久性。 The control does not affect any persistence for the object. 如果已重写`false` 属性以返回, 则设计器会使用关联的对象本身来生成设计时标记, 对控件的设计时更改将保存到页面标记源。 If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated object itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control are persisted to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或根据控件是否标记为类级别特性来确定其值。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute.

para.span: 如果未重写, 则将忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the ignores the .

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control
